Translations.Text: Tata praraesa karaiba kerala se'i byakti yi ha’ba carama hatabhagya
Yiye asbikara karaiche arau mukha ghuraa'i laiche
Arau iyara paraa duraaita rakha ha’ba parama muttakbi byaktika
yiye atmasud'dhira babe nija sampada dana karae
arau tara prati karao ene anugraha na'i yara pratidana diba lagiba
kerala tara mahana pratipalakara santustira pratyasata
arau anatipalame si santusti labha karaiba
Purbahnara sapata
sapata raatira, yetiya i andhakaraacchanna haya
Tomara pratipalake tomaka paraityaga karaa na'i arau asantusta'o horaa na'i
Niscaya tomara babe parabarti samaya purbararti samayatakai uttama
Niscaya anatipalame tomara pratipalake tomaka anugraha pradana karaiba, phalata tumi santusta ha’ba
Te'om tomaka anatha arasthata poraa nachilane? Tara pichata teraemi tomaka asraya diche
Arau te'om tomaka pa'ichila pathaharaa arasthata, tara pichata toraemi tomaka pathanirdesa diche
Arau te'om tomaka pa'ichila sambalahina daraidraraupe, tara pichata teraemi abharamukta karaile
Eteke tumi etimara (anathara) prati kathora naha’ba
Arau bhikharaika dhamaka nidiba
Arau tomara pratipalakara anugrahara katha pracara karaa
Ami tomara (kalyanara) babe tomara buku prasasta karai diya na'ine
arau ami tomara paraa tomara boja apasarana karaa na'ine
yi boja'i tomara pithi bhani pela'ichila
arau amiye'i tomara (maryada brd'dhira) babe tomara smaranaka samunnata karaicho
Eteke dukhara lagate'i ache sukha
niscaya dukhara lagate'i ache sukha
Eteke yetiya'i tumi arasara poraa tetiya'i kathora ibadatata atmaniyoga karaa
Arau tomara pratipalakara prati gabhira manoyogi horaa
